info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:24AM MDT until June 19 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PHILLIPS AND SOUTHWESTERN VALLEY COUNTIES... At 523 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 26 miles northwest of Hell Creek Rec Area, or 35 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... The Bentonite Plant, Content and Sun Prairie. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
